amendment.description: Amendment ensures that each individual is aware of financial management resources provided by the Treasury Department's Financial Literacy and Education Commission.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 2 printed in part B of House Report 113-546 to ensure that each individual is aware of financial management resources provided by the Treasury Department's Financial Literacy and Education Commission.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kilmer amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 404 - 14 (Roll no. 444).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kilmer amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 404 - 14 (Roll no. 444).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Kilmer.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
